title: Kick-off
description: Aston Villa get the match underway

title: Goal! Aston Villa 1-0 Tottenham
description: Charles N'Zogbia crosses and Andreas Weimann tucks it into the bottom corner

title: Half-time
description: Villa lead 1-0 at the end of the first half

title: Goal! Aston Villa 1-1 Tottenham
description: Nacer Cahdli loses his marker on a corner and taps home

title: Goal! Aston Villa 1-2 Tottenham
description: Harry Kane's free-kick deflects off the wall and into the net
